main event: A resident of Arlington Heights, Illinois observed an unusual static or pulsating light in the sky on December 29, 1960.
interesting points: The object appeared to be the size of a large automobile,The sighting lasted for approximately 60-90 seconds,The object emitted a flashing reddish-orange to yellow to white color,It was reported as hovering before suddenly disappearing,No photographs were taken during the sighting.
witness description: Arlington Heights resident, age 29, observed the sighting during a clouded, rainy night
